violations.description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
violations.help: Frames must have an accessible name

nodes.html: <iframe frameborder="no" id="eaframe" name="eaframe" width="980" height="350" scrolling="no" src="javascript:window["contents"]" style="height: 350px;"></iframe>
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has no title attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.description: Ensure elements marked as presentational do not have global ARIA or tabindex so that all screen readers ignore them
violations.help: Elements marked as presentational should be consistently ignored

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Element is not focusable.

violations.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
violations.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

nodes.html: <amedia-username orderpage="//www.dt.no/tilbud" publication="www.dt.no" subscription-text="Bli abonnent" subscription-link="true" links="" theme="alfa">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

nodes.html: <bazaar-ad data-component-layou...="commercial" position="toppbanner" class="am-bazaar-ad lp_topp..." labeled="true" display-config="" aria-labelledby="toppbanner-1-label" ad-index="1" id="toppbanner-1" data-id="toppbanner-1" tag-id="www.dt.no/toppbanner..." pageview-id="202e3c6b-5a9f-4de8-a...">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks
